channel.title: GitHub Trending - Java (Daily)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in Java nel periodo daily

item.title: ☕ HannahFang/Crossy-Road-Style-Game (18 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: HannahFang

📝 Repository: HannahFang/Crossy-Road-Style-Game

📄 Descrizione: 🛣️ Isometric Endless Runner: A simple road-crossing game similar to Crossy Road. 🎮 Focuses on procedural level loading dan 3D-like isometric rendering. 📐 🚦

⭐ Stelle: 18

🍴 Forks: 0

💻 Linguaggio: Java

📜 Licenza: No license
